definition: dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
to reveal/to publish/to make public/to announce
to expose/to reveal/to lay bare/also pr. [pu4 lu4]
to show one's face/to appear (in public)
to expose/to unmask/to ferret out/to disclose/disclosure
to reveal (indirectly, implicitly)/to show (interest, contempt etc) by means of one's actions, tone of voice etc

sentences.english: It was, Houllier said with a completely straight face, my tribute to Rigobert.
sentences.chinese: 侯利亚完全不露表情的脸说，那是我对桑治的敬意。

sentences.english: Wear your favorite pair of open-toe shoes or sandals.
sentences.chinese: 穿你喜欢的露脚趾的凉鞋或拖鞋。
露在外面的铁会生锈的。

sentences.english: We only had a fleeting glimpse of the sun all day.
sentences.chinese: 一整天我们只看到太阳露了一下脸。

sentences.english: Laura played a joke on her father and gave herself away by laughing.
sentences.chinese: 劳拉念和父亲开个玩哭，可是她一哭就露了马脚。

sentences.english: Dew turns into frost since tonight;
sentences.chinese: 露从今夜白，月是故乡明。

sentences.english: The ship emerged from behind the fog.

sentences.chinese: 小蜜蜂欧芹草本抗痘露。

sentences.english: I also spot Stone in a cameo I hadn't noticed before. He's plays a moneyman, a financier.
sentences.chinese: 我发现斯通也在里边露了脸，扮演一个有钱的金融家。

sentences.english: Only the door and one window could be seen.
sentences.chinese: 只有那扇大门和一扇窗子露在外面。

sentences.english: For super-soft skin, lather on a light body lotion before you bathe.
sentences.chinese: 皮肤极柔嫩者，可在沐浴前涂上温和的护肤露。

sentences.english: Veal carpaccio, truffle, pickled morel mushroom.
sentences.chinese: 生薄小牛肉片，黑松露，腌制羊肚菌。

sentences.english: John and Rose love table tennis.
sentences.chinese: 约翰和露丝都热爱乒乓球。

sentences.english: This exciting football match is sponsored by Marlboro.
sentences.chinese: 这场精彩的足球赛是由万宝露赞助的。

sentences.english: Thou shalt not uncover the nakedness of thy father's sister: she is thy father's near kinswoman .
sentences.chinese: 不可露你姑母的下体，她是你父亲的骨肉之亲。

sentences.english: At this time, reminds me of "Xiao-he was exposed sharp corner" in mood.
sentences.chinese: 这时，让我想起了“小荷才露尖尖角”的意境。

definition: to cover up (a shortcoming)/to screen off/to hide/to conceal
to cover/to mask/to cover up or conceal (the truth etc)
dew point/(coll.) (of a woman) to expose one of the three areas (nipples and genitals)
to expose (to the air, light etc)/to leave uncovered/exposure
to slip out of sth/to hide sth in one's sleeve
to take off (clothes)/to shed feathers/(of color) to fade/to discolor
